name: STV Voting Circuit
description: Circuit for generating zk-SNARK proofs for an STV voting platform. This circuit ensures privacy of voter preferences and correctness of vote tally without revealing individual votes.

vote.description: The voter's preference encoded as a number. Each number represents a candidate, and the preference is ranked.

nullifier.description: A unique identifier for the vote to prevent double voting without revealing voter identity.

proof.description: The zk-SNARK proof generated by the circuit, ensuring the vote is valid without revealing the contents of the ballot.

publicSignals.description: Public signals that are used to verify the proof without revealing private inputs.
